issue.title: [Java] ListVector's setValueCount does not set inner vector's value count correctly
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8842](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8842). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In ListVector#setValueCount, we always compute data vector's value count based on lastSet - this is incorrect when valueCount is less than lastSet
